roleset.name: put into tins
roleset.note: CAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'can' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.10, Framenet entry Placing. (from can.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: The agency won't allow mushrooms that [*T*-2] were canned [*-3]or packed in brine at any Chinese plant to enter the U.S. until ``satisfactory sanitation-control measures are implemented in China to prevent'' bacterial contamination.

example.name: almost agentive
example.text: The outbreaks were traced to staphylococcus aureus, a type of bacteria that produces a toxin capable of surviving the high temperatures used in [*] canning vegetables.

roleset.name: fire (metphorical extension of 'throw away')
roleset.note: CAN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'can' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.10, Framenet entry Placing. (from can.02-v predicate notes)
CANNING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from canning.02-n)

example.name: you get the picture
example.text: [John]-1 was canned *trace*-1 from his job at the weenie factory after making one too many sexual innuendoes.
example.arg: from his job at the weenie factory
after making one too many sexual innuendoes

example.name: throw away
example.text: The American market is what matters -LRB- afterall , they took the american title of the book , not the original title -RRB- , so [all plans for a sequel]-1 were canned *-1.
